name: 結華
text: まみみん！　次の仕事、二人だねぇ
trans: Mamimin! Our next job is just the two of us, isn't it?

name: 摩美々
text:
そーみたいだねー
まぁ、よろしくー
trans:
Looks like it.
Well, let's do our best.

name: 結華
text:
よろしくー
ちなみに番組のこと、何か聞いてる？
trans:
Looking forward to it!
By the way, have you heard anything about the program?

name: 摩美々
text:
んー？　何かあったっけー
ってなんか三峰うれしそー？
trans:
Hmm? Something about the show?
Mitsumine, you seem to be really happy.

name: 結華
text:
あはー、やっぱわかっちゃう？
だってその仕事、私服で出てって言われたからさ！
trans:
Yes! You understood!
I heard we were able to wear our own clothes at the job.

name: 結華
text: 人気のファッション番組だし、今から楽しみで！
trans: It's a popular fashion show, so I'm looking forward to it!

name: 摩美々
text:
あー、そーいえばぁ……
新鮮だとは思うケド……それ以上にめんどーかもー
trans: Uh, come to think of it... I was thinking of going in a flashy outfit for the show... But, it sounds too troublesome.

name: 結華
text: えーっ、なんで？　どこが！？
trans: Eh, why so? What part is troublesome?

name: 摩美々
text:
私服ってところー
新鮮だけどめんどーかなぁ
trans:
My own clothes part.
Making them flashy seems too troublesome, right?

name: 結華
text:
そんなこと言わずにさぁ
三峰、まみみんの服、攻めてて好きなんだよ
trans:
How can you say that?
Mitsumine really likes your fashion sense!

name: 結華
text:
一緒に楽しく私服で出よー？
まみみんのかっこいいとっておき、三峰に見せてー！
trans:
I want us to have fun together in style, you know?
Mamimin's cool, and I want you to show me what it is!

name: 摩美々
text:
そう言われてもー、
服とかたくさんあるから選ぶのも大変なんだよー？
trans: Even through you say that. I have too many clothes, and having to chose an outfit seems like a pain.

name: 摩美々
text:
それに、衣装合わせのために
いっぱい持って来なきゃいけないのはもっとめんどー
trans: Also in order to chose the best outfit, I would have to carry all of those clothes here which is more of a pain.

name: 結華
text:
あー……確かに、服持って事務所に
集合しなきゃなのは、ねぇ……
trans:
Ahhh, your right...
We'd have to carry all of our clothes to the office...

name: 摩美々
text:
そうだよー？
荷物増えるだけだからねー
trans:
Exactly.
We'll just be overrun with luggage.

name: 結華
text:
……いや、でも待って！
これはむしろチャンスなんじゃないだろうか！
trans:
...Hell no──
Actually! This could possibly be a great chance!

name: 摩美々
text:
チャンスー？
どーゆーことー？
trans:
Chance?
What do you mean?

name: 結華
text:
三峰さ、まみみんのこと、
一度コーディネートしてみたいと思ってたんだよね
trans:
Mitsumine, for one day will become
Mamimin's personal coordinator!

name: 摩美々
text:
私をー？
三峰、そんなこと考えてたんだねー
trans:
You'll do that for me?
That's something only Mitsumine can think up.

name: 結華
text:
そう！　だから、たとえ荷物が重くても、
着せ替えして遊ぶためだと思えば苦じゃないはず……！
trans: Yep! So even if your luggage was heavy, then it wouldn't be too much trouble if you think it's for changing and dress up!

name: 結華
text:
三峰はこのチャンスをゲットしたい！
どうかな、まみみん！？
trans:
Mitsumine wants to take hold of this chance!
What do you think, Mamimin?

name: 摩美々
text: 三峰が私をコーディネートかぁ……
trans: Mitsumine as a coordinator...

name: 摩美々
text: まぁ……それは面白そうかもー
trans: Well... I guess that kinda sounds like fun.

name: 結華
text: おっ、好感触！　いいよいいよまみみん！
trans: Oh! An agreement! Good good Mamimin!

name: 摩美々
text:
ちょっと興味出たかもー
……私も私でー……
trans:
But there's an interest I have...
It's just I...

name: 結華
text: ん？　あれどしたの？　やっぱやめるとかそういう？！
trans: Hmm? What is it? You don't want to back out already, do you?!

name: 摩美々
text:
ふふー
チャンスっていえば、私もそうかもーって思ったんだぁ
trans:
Fufu...
I also think of this as a big change.

name: 摩美々
text: ……実は前から三峰の服、気になってたんだよねー
trans: I've been really interested in your clothes for a while now.

name: 摩美々
text:
服のセンスとかぁ、合わせとかぁ
けっこー見てたりするんだよー？
trans:
Your fashion sense and your outfits
are something I would like to try.

name: 結華
text:
おおっ、ほんとに？
三峰のファッションに興味あったりする？
trans:
Woah! Really?
Your interested in Mitsumine's fashion?

name: 摩美々
text: そうかもー
trans: Yeah.

name: 摩美々
text:
三峰って個性的な格好が多いからぁ、
けっこー私と服のセンス近いと思っててー
trans:
Mitsumine has perfected many outfits
and I believe you have a different fashion sense than mine.

name: 摩美々
text:
だから三峰がどーゆー服持ってくるのか、
ちょっと気にはなるかなぁ
trans:
That's why I believe, whatever out outfit Mitsumine brings
would always be quite interesting.

name: 結華
text:
なるほど、だったらなおさらラッキーなんじゃない？
まみみん、三峰の服見放題だよ
trans:
Exactly! We can consider ourselves very lucky!
Mamimin, you can also pick out Mitsumine's clothes!

name: 結華
text:
……あ、そうだ。ここまできたらさぁ、
まみみんも三峰の服、コーディネートしてよ！
trans:
And then... That's it!
It's decided Mamimin will cordinate for Mitsumine instead!

name: 摩美々
text: 私も三峰の服、選んでいいってことー？
trans: You say it's okay for me to pick out your clothes?

name: 結華
text:
そうそう！
まみみんは三峰の！　三峰はまみみんの！
trans:
Yes! Yes!
Mamimin will do for Mitsumine! And Mitsumine will do for Mamimin!

name: 結華
text:
お互いのセンスで、お互いに着せたい服を選んだら
面白そうじゃない？
trans: Wouldn't be funny, if we do have the same fashion sense and accidentally pick out the same clothes?

name: 結華
text:
手持ちの服で、自分じゃ絶対思いつかないコーデが
見れたりするかもしれないし！
trans: Making each other's outfits, we'll defiantly coordinate something up with feelings without noticing it!

name: 摩美々
text:
確かにおもしろそーだねー、
三峰のことコーディネートしてみたかったし、いいよー
trans: This will be definitely fun, since I've been wanting to coordinate for you. Let's do it.

name: 摩美々
text: そしたら、私もちゃんと服持ってこなきゃだなぁ……
trans: And I guess, this means I really have to think about what to chose.

name: 摩美々
text:
三峰のおかげで、
ちょっとやる気でたかもー
trans:
For your sake.
I think I would like to give it a try.

name: 摩美々
text:
私服持ってくるのはやっぱりめんどーだけどー
楽しみができたから頑張ろーかなぁ
trans: Yes. Chosing clothes can be troublesome, but since we're making it more fun, I wanna try my best.

name: 結華
text: やーった！　まみみん物分かりがいい！
trans: Yes! Mamimin's pumped up!

name: 摩美々
text: 三峰の服、楽しみにしてるからぁ
trans: Because I'm looking forward to Mitsume's outfit.

name: 結華
text: 三峰もだよ、当日よろしくね
trans: I feel the same, let's take care of eachother!

name: 摩美々
text:
ふふー
衣装合わせ、けっこー楽しみかもー
trans:
Fufu,
Working together can actually be really fun.
